metadata.description: Umimonogatari Marin, the Japanese No.1 Pachinko character, shows up in the manga. Manga art by Akira Himekawa / Himekawa Art Production. One day, Marin, a beautiful dancer, comes across a theft case of the Power Stone and she ends up getting involved in a conspiracy led by an organization. What will be her fate?
metadata.name: Marin
